name: Cultures - 8th Wonder of the World
description: Install Cultures 2 using a CD or a mounted ISO.

files.file1: N/A:Please select the Cultures - 8th Wonder of the World setup file

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Cultures - 8th Wonder of the World setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Wonder/Game.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
